= Development =

=== Phase 1 ===

=== Use cases === 

 * User creates an address by digitizing a point
 * User imports addresses in various formats
 * User searches an address
 * User exports addresses

=== Implementation ===

 * PostGIS database
 * REST service for addresses amanagement: POST, GET, PUT, DELETE
 * REST service for data export
 * Mapping client

= Data =

 * Define data model
  * ID: Identifier
  * STREET: String
  * HOUSE_NUMBER: String
  * ADDRESS_EXTENSION: String
  * POSTAL_CODE: String
  * CITY: String
  * LATITUDE: Number
  * LONGITUDE: Number
  * GEOMETRY: Point Geom
  * ORIGIN: String
  * REFERENCE_URL: "http://www.openaddresses.org"
  * DATE_CREATED: Date
  * DATE_MODIFIED: Date
  * DATE_DELETED: Date
